name: bigbluebutton
description: BigBlueButton is an open-source virtual classroom system designed for online teaching. It supports real-time audio, video, whiteboards, breakout rooms, and recording, all accessible through a web browser with no client software required.
features: Virtual Classroom: Complete online teaching platform with real-time interaction. Education reimagined.
Audio & Video: High-quality conferencing with screen sharing capabilities. Crystal clear communication.
Interactive Whiteboard: Collaborate visually with drawing and annotation tools. Engage students actively.
Breakout Rooms: Split classes into smaller groups for focused discussions. Enhanced learning.
Session Recording: Record classes for later review and absent students. Never miss content.
Browser-Based: No software installation required for participants. Instant access.
Polling & Quizzes: Engage students with interactive assessments. Real-time feedback.
Open Source: Self-host for complete control over your virtual classroom. Privacy and customization.
